item.title: my digital garden is rhizomatic
item.description: ðŸŒ¿ budding and almost ready to split into Zettels My note seedlings don’t take root and branch off, with branches returning to a single point (the trunk of the tree). My note seedlings are, instead, rhizomes. The notes and ideas don’t have one origin point. “Branches can grow out of any spot towards any direction.”1 â€œRhizomes, however, do not function according to representation. Nothing in a rhizome represents something else. There are only connections.
